reviewText: This video was painful to watch, mono toned and too many gimmicks to MAKE the horse do what he wanted it to do. I think for a person who is just trying to learn this could end up bad for the horse or person trying to use the techniques.  I waited too long to watch it so I could no longer return it, I unfortunately ordered I and II and am now stuck with them.
Great videos.  More detailed than any other I've see.
For a total of $30.00 I was very disappointed in this video, half of it was the tools and how to wrap the legs....sorry would not recommend!

I was hooked after watching Trick Horse Training Fundamentals I, and Trick Horse Training Fundamentals II did not disappoint!!! I have horses with a wide variety of temperaments and personalities, and Allen's techniques work for all of them. If I can figure out how to post a picture with this review, I will put one up so you can see this DVD in action--I was able to teach my horse to lay down, sit and sit up. They love these tricks as much as I do!
